Detailed Description

This class collects all vcs handling.

The VCS entries are read in from vcs.xml, this is done during wxExApp startup.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExVCS::wxExVCS ( )

Default constructor.

Use GetDir to check on vcs for current base folder.

wxExVCS::wxExVCS ( const wxArrayString &  files,
int  menu_id = -1 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
filesSpecify several files for which you want vcs action.
menu_idThe menu command id that is used to set the vcs command.
wxExVCS::wxExVCS ( const wxFileName &  filename) [inline]

Constructor for vcs from specified filename.

Parameters:
filenameThis must be an existing xml file containing all vcs. This is done during wxExApp startup.

Member Function Documentation

int wxExVCS::ConfigDialog ( wxWindow *  parent,
const wxString &  title = _("Set VCS") 
) const

Shows a dialog allowing you to choose which vcs to use and to set the path for each known vcs.

Returns dialog return code.

long wxExVCS::Execute ( )

Executes the vcs command, and collects the output.

Returns return code from command Execute.

bool wxExVCS::GetDir ( wxWindow *  parent = NULL)

Checks whether the current base folder is under vcs control.

If not, it will show a dialog for selecting a vcs folder. Sets the entry.

Parameters:
parentParent window for showing dir dialog if there is not a current directory.
const wxString wxExVCS::GetName ( ) const

Returns name for current vcs entry, or empty string if vcs is not used.

static bool wxExVCS::Read ( ) [static]

Reads all vcs (first clears them) from file.

Returns true if the file could be read and loaded as valid xml file.

wxStandardID wxExVCS::Request ( wxWindow *  parent)

Combines ShowDialog, Execute and vcs entry ShowOutput in one method.

Returns wxID_CANCEL if dialog was cancelled, or an execute error occurred. Returns wxID_OK if okay (use vcs entry GetError to check whether the output contains errors or normal info).
